operationConfig.name: getCustomerServiceAndCommunicationRecords2226
operationConfig.oMapping: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?><mapper xmlns="http://www.kony.com/ns/mapper">                                                                            <map inputpath="response_in" outputpath="response_out">                                                                                                                                                    <map inputpath="records" outputpath="records">                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    <set-param outputpath="serviceTitle" inputpath="Service_Name"  />                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             <set-param outputpath="serviceDescription" inputpath="Service_Description" />                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <set-param outputpath="serviceStatus" inputpath="Service_Status_id" />                                                                                                                                                                               <map inputpath="Communication_Records" >                                                                                 <exec-function name="kony.logical:equal" outputpath="EmailCondition" output="$vars">                                                                                                    <set-arg name="typeId" inputpath="ServiceCommunication_Typeid" />                                                                                                    <set-arg name="value" input="COMM_TYPE_EMAIL" />                                                                                </exec-function>                                                                                <exec-function name="kony.logical:equal" outputpath="PhoneCondition" output="$vars">                                                                                                    <set-arg name="typeId" inputpath="ServiceCommunication_Typeid" />                                                                                                    <set-arg name="value" input="COMM_TYPE_PHONE" />                                                                                </exec-function>                                                                                   <choose>                                                                                                    <when test="$vars/EmailCondition">                                                                                                                                                      <map outputpath="Email" >                                                                                                                                          <set-param outputpath="priority" inputpath="ServiceCommunication_Priority"/>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <set-param outputpath="description" inputpath="ServiceCommunication_Description"/>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <set-param outputpath="value" inputpath="ServiceCommunication_Value"/>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <set-param outputpath="extension" inputpath="ServiceCommunication_Extension"/>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <set-param outputpath="status" inputpath="ServiceCommunication_Status_id"/>                                                                                                                     </map>                                                                                                    </when>                                                                                                    <when test="$vars/PhoneCondition">                                                                                                                                                    <map outputpath="Phone" >                                                                                                                                         <set-param outputpath="priority" inputpath="ServiceCommunication_Priority"/>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <set-param outputpath="description" inputpath="ServiceCommunication_Description"/>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <set-param outputpath="value" inputpath="ServiceCommunication_Value"/>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <set-param outputpath="extension" inputpath="ServiceCommunication_Extension"/>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              <set-param outputpath="status" inputpath="ServiceCommunication_Status_id"/>                                                                                                                     </map>                                                                                                    </when>                                                                                </choose>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              </map>                                                                                                                      </map>                                                                                                                          </map></mapper>
